name: My Mcfluff Chicken Nuggets
description: Hey guys, we finally have chicken nuggets on our menu! come and get it while it’s nice and fresh $100 each! come get your own now! 💆‍♂️🐹👅

name: Tommy’s “Kiss Me More” Doja Cat obsession
description: Hey guys, Tommy keeps singing “Kiss Me More” by Doja Cat! He’s obsessed I taught my bby well 😌😌😌😌 Come watch $10 per minute and enjoy the festival in Cinda’s new play house. Hope to see you all there!
